name: Choose Your Own Dylan
description:
This game is my solo project for my senior theatre class. This project is a piece of creative mixed media in which we explore something that plagues or fascinates us, and expresses our artistry. For me, pursuing computer science in college, I wanted to create a "performance" that incorporated my game development skills, as well as my theatrical skills.

How to Install:

WINDOWSOSX
1. Download the WIN64 version of the game. 
2. Unzip the folder.
3. Run The .exe file inside of the folder to play the game.
1. Download the OSX version of the game.
2. Unzip the folder.
3. Run the Application inside of the folder.
IMPORTANT: IF YOU GET AN ERROR
THAT THE APP IS NOT SAFE, GO TO YOUR PRIVACY SETTINGS AND ALLOW APPS FROM THIS DEVELOPER.
